programme.desc: Em 1968, os militares destroem uma instalação após a liberação de uma bactéria. Nos dias atuais, um paciente saindo de uma instituição psiquiátrica encontra um velho tubo de vácuo que, ao ser aberto, libera bactérias que transformam as pessoas em zumbis.

programme.title: A luta de Inuyasha com Royakan continua. Agome interrompe seu encontro com Hojo para retornar ao santuário, onde ela sente a presença da Jóia.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Verdade Sobre a Origem de Narak; A Alma de Kikyo

programme.title: Kikyo aparentemente ressuscitou e está vivendo como uma sacerdotisa da aldeia. Um monge errante percebe que nem tudo é como parece com ela.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Um Sorriso Perverso; Alma Errante de Kikyo

programme.title: Inuyasha procura por Kikyo, mas Agome a encontra primeiro. Kikyo a leva prisioneira e não escuta suas tentativas de explicar o que realmente aconteceu.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Voz de Kagome e o Beijo de Kikyo

programme.title: A Exterminadora de Youkais Sango é convidada para o Castelo de Hitomi junto com seu pai e seu irmão mais novo, Kohaku, deixando sua aldeia indefesa.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Acreditando que ele seja seu inimigo, Sango procura Inuyasha em uma busca equivocada de vingança planejada por Narak, que quer Inuyasha morto.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Depois que Inuyasha e seus amigos param para enterrar os mortos, Sango revela a história secreta das origens da Jóia: a própria alma da sacerdotisa Midoriko.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Segredo da Jóia das Quatro Almas é Finalmente Revelado!

programme.title: Inuyasha e seus amigos descobrem uma aldeia que sacrifica crianças ao deus local da água e conhece um menino chamado Taromaru que precisa de sua ajuda.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Lago da Escuridão Controlado pelo Deus da Água

programme.title: Depois que o túnel de vento de Mirok é atingido em uma luta com um youkai, Mirok retorna ao templo onde ele foi criado por Mushin, mas nem tudo está bem por lá.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Agome e Sango falam sobre seus respectivos passados, incluindo o irmão mais novo de Sango, Kohaku. Mas Narak tem planos sinistros para com ele.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Angústia de Sango e a Vida de Kohaku

programme.title: Sango rouba a Tessaiga enquanto Inuyasha luta contra Kohaku e vai para o castelo de Narak. Ela pretende matá-lo, mas não será assim tão fácil.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Tessaiga Roubada e o Confronto no Castelo de Narak

programme.title: Sango e Kirara precisam de um antídoto para o veneno de Narak, então Inuyasha e Agome vão para uma vila onde eles encontram o gentil youkai Jinenji.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Jinenji: O Youkai Bondoso e Solitário

programme.title: Inuyasha e seus amigos encontram uma caverna quando investigam youkais nas montanhas. Enquanto isso, Narak descobre que Kikyo ainda está viva.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Kikyo e Inuyasha Varridos pelo Miasma

programme.title: Inuyasha e seus amigos partem para salvar Kikyo, mas são vulneráveis a ataques de youkais. Apenas Agome está imune, graças à Jóia.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Sesshomaru está insatisfeito com a espada Tenseiga, e ele exige que o ferreiro Totosai lhe faça outra. Totosai chama o Inuyasha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e Sesshomaru continuam sua batalha, fazendo pleno uso de suas respectivas heranças. Após a luta, Sesshomaru encontra a órfão Rin.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Celebre Espada Escolhe seu Verdadeiro Mestre!

programme.title: Kuga, o líder da tribo de youkais lobos orientais, desafia Inuyasha para uma luta depois de usar os fragmentos da Jóia como acessórios.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Sequestro de Agome! Kuga, O Youkai Lobo Super Veloz!

programme.title: Inuyasha e os outros estão a caminho para resgatar Agome e Shippo. Agome concorda em ajudar Kuga sob a condição de que Shippo não seja ferido.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Youkai que se Apaixonou por Agome

programme.title: Agome retorna ao presente depois de outra discussão com Inuyasha. De volta à escola, ela se depara com mais problemas de relacionamento.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Separados, Os Dois se dão Conta de Seus Sentimentos

programme.title: Os insetos de Narak roubam um fragmento de Jóia da testa de um youkai urso. A cria de Narak, Kagura, usa um fragmento para controlar a tribo do lobo e Kuga.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Um Plano Ardiloso! Uma Luta de Vida ou Morte!

programme.title: A batalha de Inuyasha contra Kuga continua até que a própria Kagura apareça. A cria de Narak domina os ventos na batalha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Armadilha de Kagura: A Mestra do Vento!

programme.title: Mirok se reúne com Koharu, uma garota que fugiu de sua aldeia depois que eles se conheceram. Então a irmã mais velha de Kagura, Kanna, usa Koharu para atacar Inuyasha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Dança de Kagura e Espelho de Kanna

programme.title: Inuyasha continua lutando contra Kagura. O espelho de Kanna revela recursos inesperados quando Inuyasha usa a Ferida do Vento contra ela.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha exige saber por que Kikyo deu os fragmentos da Jóia que ela roubou de Agome para Narak, que libera um youkai com chifres.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Sesshomaru leva as presas do falecido Goshinki ao renegado aprendiz de Totosai, Kaijinbo, para fazer uma nova espada, enquanto Totosai repara Tessaiga.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: A batalha de Kaijinbo com Inuyasha, empunhando a espada Tokijin, termina em destruição, e Kagura sente uma abertura para Sesshomaru destruir seu irmão.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Kuga quer se vingar de Narak pela morte de seus membros da tribo. Quando o mais novo lacaio de Narak, Juromaru, o desafia, ele tem sua chance.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Agome retorna ao presente depois de uma briga com Inuyasha. Enquanto isso, Narak planeja se livrar dos sentimentos de Onigumo por Kikyo dentro dele.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Coração de Onigumo Ainda Vive em Narak

programme.title: No presente, Agome sente que Inuyasha escolheu Kikyo, e decide nunca mais voltar ao passado depois de devolver os fragmentos da Jóia.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Quero Voltar ao Lugar Onde Nós Conhecemos

programme.title: Sango encontra os corpos de seu pai e os outros exterminadores nas ruínas do castelo de Narak. Seu irmão Kohaku ainda vive, mas ele perdeu a memória.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: O irmão de Sango, Kohaku, foi possuído por Narak e está tentando matar Agome. Enquanto isso, Inuyasha e Mirok continuam lutando contra Kagura.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Rosto que Não Sai do Meu Coração

programme.title: Sesshomaru visita o youkai da árvore Bokusen-Oh buscando os segredos da transformação de Inuyasha. Enquanto isso, Sango se preocupa com um Kohaku inconsciente.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha se transforma em um youkai quando sua vida corre perigo. Ele rapidamente acaba com Gatenmaru, que se transformou. Ele ataca os bandidos que estão escapando com suas garras, e ele não pode ouvir Agome tentando pará-lo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Verdadeira Natureza do Youkai Não Pode ser Reprimida

programme.title: Inuyasha visita Totosai com a Tessaiga quebrada. Sua própria presa é usada para consertá-la.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Inimigo Mortal de Meu Pai: Ryukusei

programme.title: Ryukotsusei tira a Tessaiga de Inuyasha e ele se transforma em um youkai. Totosai diz a todos para recuar porque estão em perigo, mas Agome decide ficar para trás.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Onda Explosiva! O Ataque Supremo da Tessaiga

programme.title: Caesar chega ao esconderijo do inimigo, e agora ele tem um novo tipo de ataque. Lisa Lisa revela seu passado a Joseph.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Lisa Lisa e Joseph descobrem que Wamuu e Kars esperam por eles no hotel com uma centena de vampiros aliados, e ela elabora um plano inteligente para tirá-los dali.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Em uma arena antiga, Joseph e Wamuu disputam uma corrida de bigas até a morte. Mesmo escolhendo a primeira arma, Joseph se vê em uma situação perigosa.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Joseph usa a bandana de Caesar para se defender do ataque final de Wamuu. Lisa Lisa desafia Kars para um combate nas ruínas do templo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Joseph tenta impedir que Lisa Lisa sofra uma queda mortal. Speedwagon revela detalhes sobre o passado de Lisa Lisa.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: A Pedra Vermelha deixa Kars praticamente invencível. Joseph planeja atrair Kars para um vulcão e acabar com ele por lá.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kars surge da lava derretida e ataca Joseph, que instintivamente segura a Pedra Vermelha para se proteger dos golpes do inimigo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O ano é 1987. Joseph vai até o Japão quando descobre que seu neto Jotaro alega estar possuído por espíritos malignos e se recusa a sair da cela.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O homem possuído por um espírito maligno

programme.title: Jotaro volta à vida normal, mas esconde o que Joseph chama de "Stand". A caminho da escola, o mesmo Jotaro se machuca e conhece um aluno chamado Kakyoin.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro ignora os protestos de Joseph e tenta usar seu Stand para impedir que DIO continue controlando o cérebro de Kakyoin.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kakyoin ataca um Stand sem saber quem é o seu usuário. Jotaro e seus aliados encontram um dos assassinos a mando de DIO no voo para o Egito.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: A vitória parece certa quando Avdol usa seus poderes contra o assassino Polnareff, que tem a mente controlada por DIO. Quem será o vencedor desta batalha?
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro e seus aliados viajam até Singapura pelo mar. Um Stand com usuário desconhecido ataca Jotaro assim que um passageiro clandestino é encontrado no navio.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O grupo de Jotaro encontra um orangotango em um cargueiro que parece abandonado. Durante uma busca no barco, eles se deparam com algo misterioso.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O grupo de Jotaro chega ao hotel em Singapura, mas Polnareff cai direto na armadilha de um usuário de Stand ao entrar no quarto.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro começa a desconfiar que Kakyoin esteja possuído quando ele age de modo estranho e espanca brutalmente um ladrão em Singapura.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Polnareff parte sozinho para vingar a irmã depois de ser atacado por um estranho Stand que só pode ser visto no reflexo de um espelho.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O Imperador e o Enforcado – Parte 1

programme.title: Kakyoin tenta convencer Polnareff a fugir quando descobre que o aliado está enfrentando uma batalha perdida contra o Stand inimigo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O Imperador e o Enforcado – Parte 2

programme.title: Algo estranho está crescendo no braço de Joseph. Quando um médico tenta retirá-lo, um rosto aparece no tumor e declara ser um Stand.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro e seu grupo ultrapassam um carro em uma estrada nas montanhas. Logo em seguida, Polnareff vê um caminhão no sentido contrário. Será que vai dar tempo de desviar?
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro e seus aliados desconfiam que exista um Stand por perto quando encontram um cadáver em uma tranquila cidade do Paquistão.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Polnareff é atacado por um exército de zumbis após descobrir que a velhinha responsável pelo hotel é uma usuária de Stand.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro e seus aliados enfrentam um assassino cruel, que segue as ordens de DIO para matar sem um pingo de hesitação.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kakyoin e Polnareff descobrem um Stand inimigo capaz de atacar as células cerebrais quando mandam seus Stands para a cabeça de Joseph.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro e seus aliados atravessam um deserto em que o Sol nunca se põe e a temperatura aumenta a níveis insuportáveis.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kakyoin sonha com um parque de diversões onde se ouve o choro de um bebê. De volta ao mundo real, um bebê aparece como passageiro do avião em que está a equipe de Jotaro.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Ninguém leva a preocupação de Kakyoin com o bebê a sério, mas a verdade logo vem à tona quando eles vão parar no mundo dos pesadelos.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro e seu grupo encontram o pai de Avdol em uma ilha remota, mas o homem vive sozinho e não quer contato com ninguém. Polnareff descobre uma lâmpada estranha.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O Stand que surge da lâmpada atende ao terceiro desejo de Polnareff e ressuscita Avdol, mas o ex-defunto só quer saber de acabar com o autor do desejo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro e seu grupo vão ao Egito em um submarino para enfrentar DIO, mas uma caneca de café passa por uma estranha transformação quando eles se aproximam do continente.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Quando precisam sair do submarino e escapar do Stand inimigo, Jotaro e seu grupo encontram o que parecem ser dois túneis embaixo d'água.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Um helicóptero aterrissa na frente de Jotaro e seu grupo no Egito, mas não parece trazer a ajuda que Joseph pediu.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Iggy, o louco, e N'Doul, o deus Geb – Parte 1

programme.title: Avdol cria um plano para se defender do Stand, mas o inimigo está atento. Iggy, que deveria ajudar o grupo, cai no sono bem no meio da luta.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Iggy, o louco, e N'Doul, o deus Geb – Parte 2

programme.title: Meu Amigo Ninja, (2018, Animated)
programme.desc: Em uma fábrica ilegal de bonecas na Tailândia, um empresário malvado explora crianças trabalhadoras. Após um infeliz acidente, uma boneca ganha vida e viaja para a Dinamarca, onde faz amizade com um garoto, pedindo ajuda para se vingar.

programme.title: Em Busca do Paraíso, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Forçado fazer uma jornada perigosa, um nobre guerreiro se depara com inúmeras dificuldades, lugares misteriosos, magia e aventura para chegar ao que seria o paraíso distante.

programme.title: O Jovem Viking, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Halvdan é um menino diferente, longe do tipo ideal de viking para sua aldeia. Quando ele conhece Meia, a filha do chefe da tribo inimiga, começa uma incrível aventura sobre amizade e superação de diferenças.

programme.title: Yoko, (2012, Family Sci-Fi & Fantasy)
programme.desc: Uma menina em luto conhece Yoko, um ser cheio de bondade e gentileza.

programme.title: O Legado Do Grande Mestre, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Mantendo-se discreto depois de ter sido derrotado por Ip Man, Cheung Tin Chi mete-se em sarilhos depois de se envolver numa luta com um estrangeiro poderoso.

programme.title: O Matador - Missão Resgate, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Quando a garota de quem ele está cuidando é sequestrada, um assassino aposentado rapidamente recupera seus instintos assassinos, incendiando a cidade.

programme.title: City Hunter: O Caçador de Encrenca, (1993, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ryu Saeba, detetive particular, busca a filha fugitiva de um empresário em um navio cruzeiro sequestrado por bandidos.

programme.title: Aliança Mortal, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Um grande carregamento de drogas desaparece entre a fronteira Canadá-Estados Unidos. Os traficantes de drogas que o procuram obrigam um guarda florestal, um ex-membro das Forças Especiais, a ajudá-los a encontrar a droga.

programme.title: A Hora do Acerto, (2004, Action)
programme.desc: Para a Gangue dos 5, tudo é um videogame: matar policiais, armar emboscadas e criar requintes de crueldade. Quem se torna vítima de suas armadilhas é o inspetor de polícia Wing e todo o seu time de policiais, que são brutalmente assassinados.

programme.title: O Justiceiro, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: Um policial problemático disfarçado deve se infiltrar em uma gangue implacável. Mas as coisas azedam quando outro policial revela seu disfarce e ele rapidamente se vê lutando por sua vida e pela vida de sua família.

programme.title: O Legado Do Grande Mestre, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Mantendo-se discreto depois de ter sido derrotado por Ip Man, Cheung Tin Chi mete-se em sarilhos depois de se envolver numa luta com um estrangeiro poderoso.

programme.title: O Matador - Missão Resgate, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Quando a garota de quem ele está cuidando é sequestrada, um assassino aposentado rapidamente recupera seus instintos assassinos, incendiando a cidade.

programme.title: Police Story 2 - Codinome: Radical, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Os métodos incomuns de um policial de Hong Kong levam ao seu rebaixamento para o trânsito, apesar do sucesso. Enquanto isso, um antigo inimigo sai da prisão em busca de vingança.

programme.title: Hollywood Or Bust, (1956, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A movie-mad nitwit driving across the country to his mecca, Hollywood, is joined by a gambler who wants to break into singing when they pick up a pretty girl en route. Once in Hollywood the nitwit meets his dream goddess.

programme.title: Sweet Smell of Success, (1957, Drama)
programme.desc: A columnist and a press agent tear into the maelstrom of midtown Manhattan's night creatures in a sinister game that involves money, power and ultimately survival.

programme.title: Sorry, Wrong Number, (1948, Thriller)
programme.desc: Leona is confined to her bed. One night, whilst waiting for he husband to return home, she picks up the phone and accidentally overhears a conversation between two men planning a murder.

programme.title: Birdman of Alcatraz, (1962, Drama)
programme.desc: Burt Lancaster stars in the true story of killer Robert Stroud, who spent 43 years in solitary confinement at Alcatraz, and who educated himself, becoming a world renowned authority on birds. Thelma Ritter, Telly Savalas and Karl Malden co-star.

programme.title: Elmer Gantry, (1960, Romance)
programme.desc: A Best Actor Oscar went to Burt Lancaster for his outstanding performance as a con-man-turned-preacher in this provocative indictment of religious corruption.

programme.title: Sands of Iwo Jima, (1950, War)
programme.desc: Tough-as-nails career Marine Sergeant John Stryker is greatly disliked by the men of his squad, particularly the combat replacements, for the rigorous training he puts them through.

programme.title: The Life And Death Of Colonel Blimp, (1943, Drama)
programme.desc: From the Boer War through World War II, a soldier rises through the ranks in the British military.

programme.title: Black Narcissus, (1947, Drama)
programme.desc: A group of nuns struggle to establish a convent in the Himalayas, while isolation, extreme weather, altitude, and culture clashes all conspire to drive the well-intentioned missionaries mad.

programme.title: Running Scared, (2005, Drama)
programme.desc: In the fast-paced crime drama Running Scared, Paul Walker plays a low-level mobster who, in order to save his family, must recover a gun used in a mob hit before it's found by his bosses or the cops.

programme.title: Top Gun, (1986, Action)
programme.desc: Tom Cruise is superb as Maverick Mitchell, a young flyer who's out to become the best. And Kelly McGillis plays the instructor who teaches Maverick a few things you can't learn in a classroom.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: When his mentor Admiral James Greer becomes ill, Ryan is appointed acting CIA Director of Intelligence.

programme.title: Point Break, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: An F.B.I. Agent goes undercover to catch a gang of surfers who may be bank robbers.

programme.title: Bloodsport, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Ninjitsu master Frank Dux journeys to Hong Kong to enter the Kumite, the Olympics of martial arts, and meets a beautiful American reporter. Before long he must face Chong-Li, a vicious Korean master of Tae Kwan Do, in a climactic fight to the finish.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: When his mentor Admiral James Greer becomes ill, Ryan is appointed acting CIA Director of Intelligence.

programme.title: Top Gun, (1986, Action)
programme.desc: Tom Cruise is superb as Maverick Mitchell, a young flyer who's out to become the best. And Kelly McGillis plays the instructor who teaches Maverick a few things you can't learn in a classroom.

programme.title: The Great Raid, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: As World War II rages, the elite 6th Ranger Battalion is given a mission of heroic proportions: push 30 miles behind enemy lines and liberate over 500 American prisoners of war.

programme.title: Vacancy, (2007, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: A suspenseful, classic thriller, in the tradition of Alfred Hitchcock, starring Luke Wilson and Kate Beckinsale, that will keep you on the edge of your seat and your heart pounding! Rated: R

programme.title: The Lazarus Effect, (2015, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: A group of medical researchers discover a way to bring dead patients back to life.

programme.title: 28 Days Later, (2002, Zombies)
programme.desc: Animal rights activists free a group of infected chimps to horrifying results. 28 days later, Jim wakes from a coma and explores a deserted London. He soon learns the truth behind the deserted streets and the menacing creatures that lurk in the shadows.

programme.title: Quarantine, (2008, Drama)
programme.desc: When a news crew decides to trail a brave fire-fighting team, they never suspect that the first call for help they respond to that night may be their last. Now they're trapped in an apartment complex sealed off by the government. Rating: R

programme.title: Quarantine 2: Terminal, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: Earlier tonight, a bizarre disease was unleashed in a run-down Los Angeles tenement... and no one got out alive. Yet something escaped. Now, aboard Flight 318, the first symptoms begin to show. Rating: R

programme.title: Silent Hill, (2005, Cult Horror)
programme.desc: Based on the best-selling horror action game, Silent Hill stars Radha Mitchell (Man on Fire) as Rose, a desperate mother who takes her adopted daughter, Sharon, to the town of Silent Hill in an attempt to cure her of her ailment. Rating: R

programme.title: Stephen King's Thinner, (1996, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: An obese attorney accidentally runs down and kills an old gypsy woman. After her ancient father puts a curse on him, he starts losing weight, and cannot stop. Based on the Stephen King novel, written under the pseudonym Richard Bachman.

programme.title: Vacancy, (2007, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: A suspenseful, classic thriller, in the tradition of Alfred Hitchcock, starring Luke Wilson and Kate Beckinsale, that will keep you on the edge of your seat and your heart pounding! Rated: R

programme.title: The Faculty, (1998, Teen Screams)
programme.desc: A group of small-town high school students discovers their teachers are under the control of mind-controlling alien parasites. From a smart script by Kevin Williamson (SCREAM), and directed by action-expert Robert Rodriguez (FROM DUSK TO DAWN).

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Yukako Yamagishi Falls in Love, Part 2
programme.desc: Yukako’s dangerous obsession with reshaping Koichi into a man fit for her gets worse, prompting Koichi to hatch an escape plan. He tries to call Josuke for help using a nearby pay phone but is stopped by Yukako, who anticipated his move.
programme.sub-title: Yukako Yamagishi Falls in Love, Part 2

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Let’s Go Eat Some Italian Food
programme.desc: Josuke and Okuyasu come across an Italian restaurant owned by an Italian chef named Tonio. When Okuyasu asks for the menu, Tonio explains that he decides the menu on the spot based on the customer he sees.
programme.sub-title: Let’s Go Eat Some Italian Food

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Chili Pepper, Part 1
programme.desc: Chili Pepper suddenly appears before Josuke to test his Stand powers. Josuke puts up a fight but is overwhelmed by Chili Pepper’s power. The next day, Josuke and friends learn from Jotaro that a man who can locate Chili Pepper is heading to Morioh

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: The Phantom Troupe finds out that Kurapika is the one who killed Uvogin.

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: Kurapika has captured Chrollo and negotiates an exchange for Gon and Killua with Pakunoda.

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: The auction for the game Greed Island finally begins.

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: Gon and Killua join the tryouts to become Greed Island players.

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: Gon and Killua enter the world of Greed Island in hopes of finding Ging, but all they find is a message left by him.

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: Gon and Killua head for Masadora, the City of Magic, in search of spell cards.

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: Biscuit announces to Gon and Killua that she will be their teacher.

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: Gon and Killua wrap up their training, while the Bomber appears before the players who had formed an alliance.

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: Gon continues to hone his special ability by using the Enhancer, Emitter and Transmuter aura types.
programme.sub-title: Evil Fist x And x Rock, Paper, Scissors

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: Killua passes the Hunter Exam on his second attempt and returns to the game. Once reunited, Gon, Killua and Biscuit begin collecting cards steadily.

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: In order to stop Genthru from clearing the game, Gon and Killua are asked to join an alliance.

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: Gon and his friends meet the pirate boss Razor, but are overwhelmed by his power.

programme.title: Death Note: Encounter
programme.desc: The murders continue, and L grows suspicious of Light's too perfect behavior and decides to investigate him on his own.

programme.title: Death Note: Doubt
programme.desc: L's suspicion of Light deepens, compelling him to invite Light into the investigation.

programme.title: Death Note: Assault
programme.desc: As predicted on the tapes sent to Sakura TV, news anchors and commentators who expressed doubt about Kira die one by one.

programme.title: Death Note: Love
programme.desc: With a second Kira now on the loose, L asks Light to join the task force and pose as the real Kira in order to catch the copycat.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Chili Pepper, Part 2
programme.desc: Josuke and his friends gather at the Port to try and reach Joseph Joestar before Chili Pepper. Speculating the enemy is hiding nearby, Jotaro orders Josuke and Koichi to stay behind and find Chili Pepper’s user while he and Okuyasu go protect Joseph.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: We Picked Up Something Crazy!
programme.desc: With Akira Otoishi arrested and the bow and arrow safely recovered, peace seemingly returns to Morioh. But Josuke’s life is far from peaceful as he struggles to deal with his father, whose old age is making things difficult for them to bond.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Let's Go to the Manga Artist's House, Part 1
programme.desc: Koichi and Hazamada visit the home of Rohan Kishibe, a popular manga artist whom they are huge fans of. Much to their joy, Rohan not only agrees to sign autographs but also invites them to take a tour of his workspace.
programme.sub-title: Let's Go to the Manga Artist's House, Part 1

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Let's Go to the Manga Artist's House, Part 2
programme.desc: Koichi is drawn back to Rohan’s house, where he sees the manga artist finishing up his next manga at an incredible speed. Rohan uses his stand Heaven’s Door on Koichi again to gain further creative inspiration from the young boy’s life experience.
programme.sub-title: Let's Go to the Manga Artist's House, Part 2

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Let's Go Hunting!
programme.desc: Jotaro and Josuke must hunt down a rat that is believed to have become a Stand user after being shot by the bow and arrow. When the two arrive at the site, they find dozens of dead rats killed in the most bizarre fashion.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Rohan Kishibe's Adventure
programme.desc: Koichi and Rohan discover a small alley that does not appear to be listed anywhere on the map. The two decide to go into the alley to see where it leads but soon find themselves walking around in circles and unable to get out.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Shigechi's Harvest, Part 1
programme.desc: Josuke and Okuyasu become friends with a Stand user named Shigekiyo Yangu, a.k.a. Shigechi, who can use his Stand to find and collect the money that is scattered across town. Impressed by the boy’s abilities.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Shigechi's Harvest, Part 2

programme.title: Despite his injuries, Lee keeps on fighting desperately. But the tornado that envelopes Raiga’s attack takes the form of a dragon, and Lee is swallowed up by it.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto is chosen to lead Konohamaru, Moegi and Udon in a survival training exercise. Their destination is the Stone Face of Warudakumi at the top of Mt. Takurami…
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Tsunade orders Naruto, Hinata, Kiba and Akamaru on a mission to capture the thief Gosunkugi.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and the others tend to an injured Sazanami. As Sazanami tells it, he had once been a swordsmith in a peaceful town and was framed for a murder committed by Gosunkugi.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: While Guy and Lee are away, two impostors dressed like them sneak into Hidden Leaf Village.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The Land of Birds is in turmoil due to a specter known as the Cursed Warrior, which is believed to be the ghost of Lord Owashi, the previous feudal lord who died suddenly.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Moso, the late feudal lord’s counselor, and Komei, the chief strategist, are at odds with each other. Neji begins to think that the Cursed Warrior is part of a plot…
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Komei is controlling the Cursed Warrior. Moso thwarts Komei's ambitions. The Leaf team feels uneasy about his motives. Neji doesn't want to get involved, but Naruto is defiant. Gamakichi and Gamatatsu are summoned to investigate…
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Tenten and Neji have no choice but to listen to Kakashi. He senses that their being followed. Komei has been declared a criminal and is to be executed. The Cursed Warrior appears and snatches Komei away.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Sagi swears to punish Moso himself. Naruto is reminded of Sasuke when he sees Sagi. Neither words nor Naruto's attempts to stop him can deter Sagi from his chosen path of revenge.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: At Moso's mansion, a battle takes place between the Wandering Ninja and a Leaf Ninja. With Chishima's help, Naruto is freed from Moso's genjutsu. Moso then reveals his true form as the leader of the Wandering ninja, Hoki!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Choji and Naruto are craving Ichiraku's special ramen only to find out that they find the shop closed! Teuchi reveals that his daughter has been kidnapped by Ryonin, aka the Ninja Chefs, who is after his secret recipes!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The Demon of the Ocean is wreaking havoc in the Land of the Sea. Anko leads a team consisting of Naruto, Ino, and Shino. It turns out Anko has an unexpected history with the Land of the Sea.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Unable to find Naruto, Anko meets with officials from the Land of the Sea. The ship carrying government funds that they were supposed to guard sets sail the next day!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: As soon as she awakens, Anko begins to remember Demon Island, a place once visited with her former sensei, Orochimaru. Anko reveals the truth behind the disappearances and the secret behind Isaribi's body.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Amachi and his gang begin their attack on the government ship. Naruto and the others escape from Demon Island, but the sight that greets them is the Land of the Sea fleet on the verge of annihilation.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The Hidden Leaf ninja and Amachi battle it out at sea. With Naruto's help, Amachi is defeated, but then a monster appears. Naruto summons Gamabunta in order to defeat the monster.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Kunijiro visits Tsunade and decides to have Naruto guide his boy through one day in the life of a ninja!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Harlem Nights, (1989, Comedy)
programme.desc: In the waning days of Prohibition, Sugar Ray and his adopted son, Quick, run a speakeasy called Club Sugar Ray. Gangster Bugsy Calhoune pays corrupt cop Phil Cantone to close Club Sugar Ray down.

programme.title: Revolver, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: REVOLVER is populated with Guy Ritchie's (Snatch; Lock, Stock & Two Smoking Barrels) classic breed of fast-talking, sharp-suited gangsters but with a psychological twist that your mind may not be able to handle.

programme.title: Redemption, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Ex-soldier Joseph Smith comes home from war but has been left disturbed by his experiences. Despite his intentions to start a new life, he becomes caught up in the criminal underworld, where he plots revenge on his friend's killer.

programme.title: Filth, (2013, Comedy)
programme.desc: While working on a murder case, a scheming, manipulative policeman starts coming unhinged, slowly losing his grip on reality and suffering from a series of increasingly severe hallucinations as he desperately tries to hold his life together.

programme.title: The Godfather, (1972, Drama)
programme.desc: A chilling portrait of the Corleone family's rise and near fall from power in America along with balancing the story of the Sicilian clan's ugly crime business in which they are engaged.

programme.title: The Godfather Part II, (1974, Drama)
programme.desc: The continuing saga of a young Vito Corleone growing up in Sicily and in New York during the 1910s and then following Michael Corleone in the 1950s as he tries to expand the family business.

programme.title: Mario Puzo's The Godfather Coda: The Death of Michael Corleone, (2020, Drama)
programme.desc: Director/screenwriter Francis Ford Coppola's definitive new edit and restoration of THE GODFATHER: PART III, with remastered picture and sound. Michael Corleone (Pacino) seeks to free his family from crime and find a suitable successor to his empire.

programme.title: The Kill Room, (2023, Comedy)
programme.desc: A hitman, his boss, an art dealer and a money-laundering scheme that accidentally turns the assassin into an overnight avant-garde sensation, one that forces her to play the art world against the underworld.

programme.title: Bridget Jones: The Edge Of Reason, (2004, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: After six perfect weeks with boyfriend Mark Darcy, the mischievous Daniel Cleaver returns, claiming to be a reformed man. Can Bridget find a way to make true love last forever? A comedy that proves there's nothing like love to send you over the edge.

programme.title: Gambit, (2014, Comedy)
programme.desc: Harry Deane (Colin Firth) is a man with a plan. Art Curator for media tycoon, Lord Lionel Shabandar (Alan Rickman), Harry devises an elaborate plot to con his abusive boss into purchasing a fake Monet painting.

programme.title: Genius, (2016, Drama)
programme.desc: Nicole Kidman and Colin Firth star in this stirring drama about the friendship between Thomas Wolfe and editor Maxwell Perkins (who discovered F. Scott Fitzgerald and Ernest Hemingway).

programme.title: Hot Summer Nights, (2018, Drama)
programme.desc: An awkward teenager gets in over his head dealing drugs while falling for his business partner's enigmatic sister during one scorching summer in Cape Cod, Massachusetts.

programme.title: Drugstore June, (2024, Comedy)
programme.desc: After the pharmacy in her small town is robbed, a girl who still lives at home with her parents takes matters into her own hands to solve the crime, while at the same time trying to get over her ex-boyfriend and become more of an adult.

programme.title: All Styles, (2018, Drama)
programme.desc: Brandon, a freshman in college, tries to focus on his studies but keeps coming to the same conclusion, dance is his passion. He assembles a ragtag crew to face off against his former crew and must prove that they have what it takes to make it as dancers.

programme.title: The Motel, (2005, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Puberty sucks, and nobody knows it better than 13-year-old Ernest. As he watches guests come and go, Ernest finds himself forever stuck at his family's hourly-rate motel and longing for the girl of his dreams, 15-year-old Christine.

programme.title: When We Were Kings, (1997, Documentary)
programme.desc: A documentary of the 1974 heavyweight championship bout in Zaire, 'The Rumble in the Jungle,' between champion George Foreman and underdog challenger Muhammad Ali.

programme.title: The Craft, (1996, Thriller)
programme.desc: Sarah has always been different. So as the new girl at St. Benedict's Academy, she immediately falls in with the high school outsiders. But these girls won't settle for being powerless misfits.

programme.title: The Crow, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Visually stunning and action-packed, this hit movie, based on the comic book series, follows the return from the grave of a young rock guitarist who, along with his fiancée, is brutally killed by a ruthless gang of criminals.

programme.title: Sleepy Hollow, (1999, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Johnny Depp is Ichabod Crane, an investigator determined to stop the murderous Headless Horseman.

programme.title: Basic Instinct, (1992, Thriller)
programme.desc: San Francisco detective Nick Curran is investigating the murder of a once-celebrated rock star, and he's made a few unsettling discoveries: a bloody ice pick, a white silk scarf tied to a bedpost, and evidence of an otherwise romantic evening.

programme.title: Double Jeopardy, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: Libby Parsons, who discovers that the husband she’s convicted of murdering staged his own “death” and framed her for the crime. Released on parole, she skips town to find him–and that puts parole officer Travis Lehman on her trail.

programme.title: The Crow, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Visually stunning and action-packed, this hit movie, based on the comic book series, follows the return from the grave of a young rock guitarist who, along with his fiancée, is brutally killed by a ruthless gang of criminals.

programme.title: Sleepy Hollow, (1999, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Johnny Depp is Ichabod Crane, an investigator determined to stop the murderous Headless Horseman.

programme.title: Idle Hands, (1999, Comedy)
programme.desc: The devil will find work for idle hands to do, but what happens when he chooses the laziest teen slacker in the world to do his dirty work? Anton Tobias is a couch potato burn-out who can't control the murderous impulses of his possessed hand. Rated: R

programme.title: Love And Bullets, (1979, Action)
programme.desc: The FBI sends a loner (Charles Bronson) to kidnap a mobster's mistress in Switzerland.

programme.title: Death Wish, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: In this explosive story of revenge and urban violence, Charles Bronson plays Paul Kersey, a bleeding-heart liberal who has a change of opinion after his wife and daughter are violently attacked by a gang of thugs in their apartment.

programme.title: The Harder They Come, (1972, Action)
programme.desc: Reggae legend Jimmy Cliff stars as Ivan Martin, an aspiring singer hoping to make a name for himself. Robbed of his money and possessions, he finds work with a self-righteous preacher

programme.title: Hair, (1979, Musical)
programme.desc: A country boy and Vietnam draftee embark on an adventure of a lifetime when he meets a group of counterculture hippies and his eyes are opened to the darker side of class, race, and big city life in this adaptation of the Broadway sensation.

programme.title: Saturday Night Fever, (1976, Dance & Party)
programme.desc: John Travolta performs as the troubled Tony Manero - Brooklyn paint store clerk by day and undisputed king of the dance floor by night. A powerful and provocative urban tragedy that carries as much significance today as it did in 1977.

programme.title: The Harder They Come, (1972, Action)
programme.desc: Reggae legend Jimmy Cliff stars as Ivan Martin, an aspiring singer hoping to make a name for himself. Robbed of his money and possessions, he finds work with a self-righteous preacher

programme.title: Rancho Deluxe, (1975, Western)
programme.desc: Jack (Jeff Bridges) and Cecil (Sam Waterston) are an oddball team of modern-day Montana cattle rustlers, and they’ve set their sights on a pair of unlikely ranch owners from New York (Clifton James, Elizabeth Ashley). But can they outfox the foxes?

programme.title: The Long Goodbye, (1973, Action)
programme.desc: Under the inimitable direction of Robert Altman, Elliot Gould stars as the laid-back, legendary private eye Philip Marlowe investigating a mysterious murder. Also stars Sterling Hayden and Nina Van Pallandt.

programme.title: The Gambler, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: James Caan portrays a compulsive gambler who can't quit or win. He falls into debt to the mob for $40,000 but seems to relish the thrill of gambling against the long shot.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Valon is ready to take on the world and fight... for the heart of Mai? And the first adversaries standing in his way are Duke and Rebecca!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a duel thirty thousand feet in the air as Alister squares off against Kaiba on top of an airplane.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Alister dispatches his airborne arsenal Air Fortress Ziggurat! How can Kaiba defeat a monster the size of the plane itself?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz has taken over KaibaCorp! Can Kaiba, with Yugi's help, break into his own company which he's protected with the latest in security technology?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With chaos running rampant, Valon separates Joey from his friends for a final showdown with Mai's heart on the line.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Decked out in high-tech body armor and weapons, Valon pummels Joey with punishing punches. Can Joey outthink the computer before it's too late?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Decked out in high-tech body armor and weapons, Valon pummels Joey with punishing punches. Can Joey outthink the computer before it's too late?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey and Valon's battle rages to its climax as Joey attempts to turn the duel around by augmenting the same armor that Valon used against him.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Broken and battered after his exhausting battle against Valon, Joey can barely stand up, much less duel. However, he faces a fresh and determined Mai.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a rematch between the Pharaoh and Rafael - but this time, the Pharaoh doesn't have Yugi to protect him.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Rafael appears to be creating an opening for the Pharaoh's counterattack, but Rafael has even more dreadful displays of terror in mind.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Rafael calls forth Guardian Dreadscythe, a ravaging reaper that can never be defeated.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After discovering the location of Dartz's secret base, our heroes are on their way to stop Dartz once and for all. Can they reach Dartz before he resurrects the lethal Grand Dragon Leviathan from its millennial slumber?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz's secrets are finally revealed! As the answers to the most puzzling questions are exposed, the Pharaoh and Kaiba realize how much is at stake.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz plants the souls of our captured heroes into Mirror Knights to use them as puppets to fight the Pharaoh and Kaiba.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz summons the thundering Orichalcos Shunoros to pound the Pharaoh and Kaiba into pancakes!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba's soul has been captured, leaving the Pharaoh all alone to fend for himself against the invincible forces of Dartz and the Orichalcos! Will his friends reach out from the beyond to give him one last fighting chance?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The gateway opens for the final endgame as the world-devourer Grand Dragon Leviathan and the legendary Atlantis rise out of its watery grave!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: All the monsters of Earth join forces with the survivors of the monster domain for an epic showdown against Grand Dragon Leviathan!
programme.sub-title: Rise of the Great Beast, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Grand Dragon Leviathan's thunderous roars unleash hundred-foot tall waves worldwide! How can Yugi stop the annihilation of the planet?
programme.sub-title: Rise of the Great Beast, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and the gang have saved the world from Dartz and his Grand Dragon Leviathan, but they're about to face their biggest challenge yet.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is trapped inside the Duel Dome, and the only way to escape is by defeating the Duel Computer, programmed with the skills of the world's top duelists. Since the Duel Computer has access to thousands of cards, how can Yugi win?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the start of the KC Grand Championship! Sixteen of the world's greatest duelists vie for a chance to challenge Yugi as the King of Games!
programme.sub-title: Let the Games Begin! Part I

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: How does Apdnarg Otum know all of Joey's strategies? How can Joey stop Apdnarg when he gathers his ancient cards to unleash the fiercest monster from the great past? But the biggest mystery... how can Joey not know who Apdnarg Otum is?
programme.sub-title: Let the Games Begin! Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the second match of the KC Grand Championship as Rebecca faces the kung-fu kicking Asia champion Vivian Wong. However, there's more at stake than just winning the duel - Yugi's heart is on the line, whether he likes it or not.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The first round is over, leaving eight duelists to compete for the right to face Yugi for the KC Grand Championship. Unfortunately for Joey, his next opponent is Zigfried Lloyd, who defeated both Weevil and Rex Raptor in one turn.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Zigfried activates Ride of the Valkyries, the same card that defeated both Weevil and Rex Raptor at the same time.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In the semifinals of the KC Grand Championship, it's a duel between child prodigies as Rebecca faces Leon Wilson and his fairy tale faction.
programme.sub-title: A Brawl in Small Town Part I

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi finds Grandpa's kidnapper, but is it really a kidnapping? While Yugi unravels the truth, Rebecca starts to unravel when her dragons fall prey to Leon's fervent fables. Rebecca must think of a new plan quickly or there will be no happy ending.
programme.sub-title: A Brawl in Small Town Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's Zigfried vs. Leon for the right to challenge Yugi in the KC Grand Championship Finals... but Kaiba stops the duel!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a battle between Zigfried and Kaiba. Zigfried quickly gains the advantage by destroying Kaiba's monsters before he can even draw them!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's Yugi vs. Leon for the title of King of Games at the KC Grand Championship! Something sinister lurks in the shadows, for this duel is more than just getting the crown. Zigfried's greatest revenge will commence as his real plan is unleashed.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Leon is Zigfried's younger brother, and he'll avenge his family's loss. Leon's fairy tales are giving Yugi nightmares but the worst is yet to come as Leon has Zigfried's mysterious and special card.

programme.title: The Straw Hats continue their quest to find a doctor for Nami. Along the way, they deal with a ravenous invader and get a chilly reception from local islanders.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Raid! The Tin Tyrant and Tin Plate Wapol!

programme.title: Luffy and Sanji make a bold trek up a snow-covered mountain in search of a witch who might hold the key to curing Nami.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An Island without Doctors? Adventure in a Nameless Land!

programme.title: Ferocious, giant, snow rabbits slow Luffy and Sanji’s progress up the mountain. Meanwhile, the former king Wapol returns to the town he abandoned.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Are You Happy? The Doctor Called Witch!

programme.title: Nami hovers near death while Luffy and Sanji fend off the abominable rabbits. Back at the village, Dalton leads a revolt against the dastardly Wapol.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Dalton's Resolve! Wapol's Corps Land on the Island!

programme.title: An unlikely source acts as a roadblock to give Luffy some climbing room, and Zorro emerges from a snow bank cold, cranky, and ready to rumble
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Island Where Snow Lives! Climb the Drum Rockies!

programme.title: After a long journey up the mountain, Nami finally receives much-needed medical attention, but Sanji and Luffy are more interested in eating the doctor!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy recruits Tony Tony Chopper to join the Straw Hat crew as the ship’s doctor.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An Outcast's Dream! Hiriluk the Quack!

programme.title: Chopper’s first friend was a quack doctor who couldn’t cure a cold, but the old man still managed to teach the little reindeer how to care for people.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Hiriluk's Cherry Blossoms and the Will that Gets Carried On!

programme.title: Luffy unleashes the full force of his Gum Gum furry on Wapol, and Chopper is amazed by the rubberman’s fierce devotion to the pirate flag.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Fight Wapol's Crew! The Power of the Munch Munch Fruit!

programme.title: When Wapol orders his goons to attack the Straw Hats, Chopper shows off a little something he calls the Rumble Ball!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Zoan-type Devil Fruit! Chopper's Seven-form Transformation!

programme.title: Wapol attacks Nami in her weakened condition, but Monkey B. Luffy is quick to step in and even the odds.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: When the Kingdom's Rule Ends! The Flag of Faith Flies Forever!

programme.title: After an explosive battle with Wapol, Luffy begins the tiring process of convincing Chopper to join his pirate gang.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Hiriluk's Cherry Blossoms! Miracle in the Drum Rockies!

programme.title: Chopper sets sail for Alabasta with his new friends, and Dalton thinks back to his first meeting with Princess Vivi.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Goodbye Drum Island! I'm Going Out to Sea!

programme.title: The Straw Hats rescue a man of many faces as they approach Alabasta. Sure, he’s good for a laugh, but they may regret pulling him out of the drink.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Alabasta's Hero and a Ballerina on the Ship!

programme.title: The Straw Hats arrive in Alabasta with precious little time to stop the rebellion. Sanji and Chopper are sent to gather supplies for a dangerous trip across the desert.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Off to the Desert Kingdom! The Rain-Summoning Powder and the Rebel army!

programme.title: Captain Smoker has Luffy in his grasp until a fiery stranger creates a diversion, giving the Straw Hats a chance to make a break for it.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Heroes' Reunion! His Name is Fire Fist Ace!

programme.title: Ace and Luffy’s happy reunion is crudely interrupted by the Billions of Baroque Works. They may be outnumbered, but these brothers are no ordinary pirates!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Ace and Luffy! Hot Emotions and Brotherly Bonds!

programme.title: Before they can start their trek across the desert, Luffy and the Straw Hats are stopped at the shore by the cute – but formidable – Kung Fu Dugongs.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Erumalu, the City of Green and the Kung Fu Dugongs!

programme.title: Luffy’s crew encounters treacherous birds and man-eating foliage on its desert odyssey, and just when they think the coast is clear, a great disturbance emerges from beneath the sand!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Adventure in the Country of Sand! The Monsters that Live in the Scorching Land!

programme.title: The Straw Hats cross paths with the Barbar Sand Pirates, and Ace runs into big trouble when he gets separated from the group.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Enter the Desert Pirates! The Men Who Live Freely!

programme.title: Princess Vivi devises a plan to test the hearts of a gang of so-called rebels. They talk a good game, but will their bite measure up to their bark?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: False Fortitude! Camu, Rebel Soldier at Heart!

programme.title: The Straw Hats continue their journey to Yuba, where a bittersweet reunion with a childhood friend awaits Princess Vivi.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Rebel Warrior Koza! The Dream vowed to Vivi!

programme.title: Fire Fist Ace is hired by two young boys to hunt down and capture a lethal bounty hunter known only as the Scorpion.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Showdown in a Heat Haze! Ace vs. the Gallant Scorpion!

programme.title: Chopper, Zoro, and Luffy get separated from the others. When the heat makes Luffy act even stranger than usual, his friends wonder if they joined the right pirate gang.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Ruins and Lost Ways! Vivi, Her Friends and the Country's Form!

programme.title: The assassins of Baroque Works gather at Spider’s Café, and the Straw Hats arrive at Yuba only to find it buried in sand.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Spiders Caf? at 8 o'Clock! The Enemy Leaders Gather!

programme.title: Crocodile reveals himself to the Baroque Works assassins and discloses his dastardly plan for Alabasta. After departing Yuba, Luffy takes a stand that forces Vivi to rethink her mission.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy vs. Vivi! The Tearful Vow to Put Friends on the Line

programme.title: Vivi takes Luffy’s advice, and the Straw Hats head towards Rainbase for a confrontation with Crocodile. Karoo finally reaches the palace with Vivi’s warning for King Cobra.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Battlefront of Alabasta! Rainbase, the City of Dreams

programme.title: Luffy leads a daring – but foolish – raid on Crocodile’s casino. His poor planning lands him behind bars with Captain Smoker – and more importantly, leaves Vivi unprotected.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Trap of Certain Defeat! Storming Raindinners!

programme.title: While the Straw Hats are stuck in the clink, King Cobra addresses the starving people of Nanohana. Will his unbelievable revelation drive his subjects past the brink of rebellion?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Operation Utopia Commences! The Swell of Rebellion Stirs!

programme.title: A royal imposter has the rebel army hell-bent on bringing Cobra’s reign to a violent end. Meanwhile, Luffy and his mates find themselves in deep trouble and even deeper water.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Terrifying Banana Gators and Mr. Prince!

programme.title: Sanji shows up in the nick of time to make the crocs cough up the key to Luffy’s freedom, but the ravenous reptiles spit up something else instead.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Key to a Great Comeback Escape! The Wax-Wax Ball!

programme.title: Crocodile snatches Vivi off the back of a giant crab, but Luffy’s not having it. The rubber-man goes toe-to-toe with the sandman in a battle that will end in bloodshed.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Merciless Mortal Combat! Luffy vs Crocodile

programme.title: Crocodile puts Luffy down for a never-ending dirt nap, and the Straw Hats get a lift from a crabby ally in their race to stop the looming rebellion.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Dash For a Miracle! Alabasta Animal Land

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and Baron Ukraine are both after the world's most skilled counterfeiter. Lupin would have no problem beating the Baron, but the Baron has hired a man called Flinch along with Fujiko and gave them instructions to kill Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Someone is posing as Lupin and blowing up bridges, causing a lot of damage and injuries. Lupin and Jigen discover that the bomber is trying to force an armored car to travel along a route of his choosing.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and Baron Ukraine are both after the world's most skilled counterfeiter. Lupin would have no problem beating the Baron, but the Baron has hired a man called Flinch along with Fujiko and gave them instructions to kill Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Mamo Kyosuke claims that Lupin will disappear from the world in four days. He claims that he is a time traveler from 2874 seeking revenge. Apparently, Lupin XIII destroyed the Mamo clan on March 2874.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko are both after the legendary Eye of the Nile emerald. It is going to be a wedding gift presented at a wedding being held on a yacht.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Zenigata has been invited to an international police convention in Europe; his chief wants him to go, but Zenigata does not want to since Lupin has declared that he will steal a gold bust within the next three days.
programme.sub-title: Let's Catch Lupin and Go to Europe

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Fujiko goads Lupin into stealing a large shipment of diamonds. Lupin takes the task despite Jigen's protest that Fujiko is playing them for fools. Of course, Jigen is right.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Fujiko invites Lupin and the gang to a famous nightclub owned by the sexy Hoshikage Rinko. Only Goemon refuses. This was a wise move as Rinko places timebombs on Fujiko, Jigen, and Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Smith is an art thief that is selling stolen paintings under the guise of a beauty contest. Lupin decides he wants in on the action as well, promising to steal away the treasured paintings.
programme.sub-title: Keep an Eye On the Beauty Contest

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Inspector Ganimard III is the grandson of Lupin I's archnemesis. He has come to Japan as the head of security for the 1972 France Fair but also intends to restore his family's honor by arresting Lupin III.
programme.sub-title: Which of the Third Generation Will Win!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Someone is committing thefts under Lupin's name. Lupin follows the imposters back to their island hideout. He has apparently stumbled into a whole island of thieves.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Rie is being held captive though she does not realize it. She believes the man holding her is a friend of her father, Ken Makita. Lupin shows up to rescue her.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Gordon, an FBI computer specialist, is in Japan to operate a computer capable of predicting crimes and determining how to stop them. The Metropolitan Police Department hopes that this will finally help them capture Lupin.
programme.sub-title: The First Move Wins Computer Operation!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: A disputed horde of recently discovered ancient gold coins draws the attention of Lupin and company. As the ownership of the coins is disputed, Lupin decides to settle the matter on his own by stealing them from the Dai Nippon Bank.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: It's been a long time since Jigen, Goemon and Fujiko have heard from Lupin. Then one day, they each receive an invitation from Lupin for a reunion aboard the luxury liner Sirloin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: An international soccer game is taking place in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil and Lupin has his eyes on the box office and betting takes. Will the box office heist go as planned?
programme.sub-title: Wads of Bills Blossomed in the Sunset of Rio

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: An old man who supposedly knows the secret to Hitler's legacy lives in East Germany within the Berlin Wall. Lupin and his gang track the old man down, but the old man can't recall anything about any legacy.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: At Loch Ness in Scotland, the mysterious monster Nessie reveals itself from the lake, charmed by Fujiko's singing. Seeing this, Doctor Oz decides to use Fujiko to capture Nessie for his personal gain.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko and a mystery man have an enticing job for Lupin: Stealing a ton of gold bullion from a Swiss Bank, a bank renowned for its tight security. Can it be done? What is the mystery man's true identity?
programme.sub-title: I'll Teach You How to Transport Gold Bars

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A man is threatening to destroy the Leaning Tower of Pisa with a device that generates artificial earthquakes. The Italian government has no choice but to meet the culprit's, but Lupin takes the ransom for himself!
programme.sub-title: Will the Leaving Tower of Pisa Be Standing?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin has stolen the golden death mask of Tutankhamen, the ancient Egyptian pharaoh known as the "boy king." However, when Lupin tries on the golden death mask he becomes possessed by an ominous curse.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Trans Europe Superexpress train has departed Venice and is headed to France. Onboard the Superexpress is crime boss Don Marcino's ill-gotten treasures. Can Lupin and his gang pull off the heist before the train reaches its destination?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin meets the grandson of master Ukiyoe artist, Toushusai Sharaku and learns that he has been switching his own works with his grandfather's originals. Unable to switch the last painting due to illness, he asks Lupin to switch it in his stead.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko have been invited to a party hosted by Marcel Dulane, a member of Paris' high society. However, the elegant party turns out to be a trap. Fujiko is taken hostage and Lupin, with a time-bomb belt strapped to his waist…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is in Monaco to race his new toy in the Monaco Grand Prix. Or so he thought. Lupin ends up losing both his money and race car in a fixed poker game at the casino.
programme.sub-title: Bet on the Monaco Grand Prix!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A rare bottle of Bordeaux, commissioned by Napoleon for his beloved wife, Josephine, is to be given to the President of the United States as a Christmas present.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A criminal gang has hidden a microfilm containing the manufacturing process for artificial diamonds, developed by NASA, in one of Inspector Zenigata's molars. Determined to get his hands on that microfilm, Lupin must capture Inspector Zenigata.
programme.sub-title: The Great Chase in San Francisco

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Forward Hees, the world's richest man, suddenly dies a mysterious death and leaves a large ruby to Fujiko in his will. After inheriting the ruby, Fujiko comes down with the same mysterious fever as Hees…
programme.sub-title: Big Adventure of the Caribbean Sea

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A Count challenges Lupin to steal a gemstone named Dracula's Tear from on board his airship, the Hendenburg. However, also on board the ship are several formidable detectives: Homes III, Detective Archer, Koojisuke Kaneda and Inspector Zenigata.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is suffering from Transformation Sickness, an illness that transforms him into a cruel, cold-blooded criminal at the stroke of midnight, and leaves him with no recollection of his murderous crime spree in the morning…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A small Arab nation has received a blackmail notice. Pay a $100 million or have their oil fields blown up. Lupin targets the money, but his plans are hindered when he finds out the culprits are using human bombs.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Black Panther, the world's largest emerald, gets its name from the black panther that appears inside it when a light shines on it at a particular angle. After capturing this one-of-a-kind emerald, Lupin hides it in a museum to retrieve it later…

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn, (1996, Vampires)
programme.desc: In this thrilling cult classic, two dangerous outlaw brothers head out on a wild crime spree. After kidnapping a father and his two kids, the bad guys head to a seedy Mexican bar for safety but come face to face with blood-sucking vampires.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn 2: Texas Blood Money, (1999, Vampires)
programme.desc: When a gang of bank robbers makes a run for the border, they wander into the wrong bar and mess with the wrong vampires. It's kill-or-be-killed in the ultimate battle to stop these evil creatures and save their own lives!

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn 3: Hangman's Daughter, (1999, Vampires)
programme.desc: Set in Mexico in the early 1900s, this prequel to the From Dusk Till Dawn series finds outlaw Johnny Madrid on the run from the hangman, with the hangman's daughter Esmeralda by his side. Together they are faced with the fight of their lives.

programme.title: Universal Soldier, (1992, Action)
programme.desc: A woman reporter discovers a Defense Department project to create androids from the bodies of Vietnam soldiers, to be then used as an elite anti-terrorism unit.

programme.title: Robocop, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: Detroit in the near future. A cop who dies in the line of duty is transformed into a crime-fighting cyborg by the corporation which now runs the police department. The only hitch: this "perfect" cop still seeks revenge on the creeps who mutilated him.

programme.title: Robocop 2, (1990, Action)
programme.desc: This first sequel pits Robocop against a gang of drug dealers and the title creature--a supposedly improved version of himself that has gone berserk.

programme.title: Robocop 3, (1993, Action)
programme.desc: In this second sequel to the 1987 hit, RoboCop leaves the force and joins the rebellion to battle the evil business corporation OCP, which uses a police-like group to remove the homeless people who populate the site of a future upscale development.

programme.title: Tomb Raider, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Armed with only her sharp mind, blind faith and stubborn spirit, young Lara Croft pushes past her limits on her very first perilous adventure into the unknown. If she survives, it could be the making of her…earning her the name tomb raider.

programme.title: Hour Of The Gun, (1967, Drama)
programme.desc: Director John Sturges presents a reworking of the Wyatt Earp/Doc Holliday legend and the struggle for political control of Tombstone, with a marvelous trio of antagonists: James Garner as Earp, Jason Robards as Holliday, and Robert Ryan as Clanton.

programme.title: Last Train From Gun Hill, (1959, Drama)
programme.desc: Screen giants Kirk Douglas and Anthony Quinn star in this taut Western thriller directed by acclaimed filmmaker John Sturges (Gunfight at the O.K. Corral, The Great Escape).

programme.title: Vera Cruz, (1954, Drama)
programme.desc: In this epic Western, two shady mercenaries (Gary Cooper, Burt Lancaster) in Mexico during the 1866 revolution are hired to escort a Countess and her gold to the Mexican army in Vera Cruz and find themselves at odds with the army…and each other!

programme.title: The Kentuckian, (1955, Drama)
programme.desc: Eli Wakefield (Burt Lancaster) and his son are Kentucky adventurers longing for life on the Texas frontier. They learn, however, that their greatest challenge lies not in the uncharted wilderness, but in the people they meet along the way.

programme.title: Kit Carson, (1940, Drama)
programme.desc: Indian fighter, trapper, and frontier scout Kit Carson leads a wagon train of settlers from Fort Bridger, along the Oregon Trail through Shoshone territory, to California, which plans to secede from Mexico.

programme.title: Comes a Horseman, (1978, Drama)
programme.desc: Set in the American West of the 1940s, a pair of little-guy ranchers join forces against the depredations of a ruthless land baron determined to expand his empire at whatever cost. Starring Jane Fonda, James Caan, and Jason Robards.

programme.title: Sabata, (1969, Drama)
programme.desc: Get ready for fast-paced, explosive action as Lee Van Cleef stars as Sabata, the mysterious, steely-eyed gunslinger who, after he discovers the masterminds behind an elaborate bank heist, imposes his bullet-laced brand of justice on a guilty town.

programme.title: Adios, Sabata, (1970, Action)
programme.desc: Under the brutal rule of garrison leader Col. Skimmel, a group of Mexican revolutionaries hire gunslinger Sabata (Yul Brynner) to rob a transport of gold in order to buy weapons. But the Colonel has other plans...taking the gold for himself.

programme.title: The Brothers Grimm, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: In this visionary film, Will and Jake Grimm dazzle small towns with their imaginative folklore and elaborate illusions, only to discover many of the fantastic characters, and thrilling situations, found in their beloved fairy tales are real.

programme.title: 3000 Miles to Graceland, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: Posing as Elvis impersonators, ex-convicts rob a Las Vegas casino during an Elvis Presley fan convention, but greed and dissention among them ultimately lead to betrayal and chaos.

programme.title: The Whole Nine Yards, (2000, Comedy)
programme.desc: An unhappy dentist in Montreal gets a new neighbor, Jimmy 'The Tulip' Teduski, a former mob hitman turned informant with a price on his head.

programme.title: Man of the House, (2005, Comedy)
programme.desc: A hard-edged Texas Ranger goes undercover to protect a group of college cheerleaders after they witness a murder.

programme.title: 3000 Miles to Graceland, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: Posing as Elvis impersonators, ex-convicts rob a Las Vegas casino during an Elvis Presley fan convention, but greed and dissention among them ultimately lead to betrayal and chaos.

programme.title: The Brothers Bloom, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: The con is on when two swindlers (Adrien Brody, Mark Ruffalo) make an heiress (Rachel Weisz) the target of their next scheme.

programme.title: The Animal, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: A wannabe cop suffers a horrible car accident, and is repaired by a mad scientist who uses animal parts. Problems arise when the animal parts begin to take over.

programme.title: 3000 Miles to Graceland, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: Posing as Elvis impersonators, ex-convicts rob a Las Vegas casino during an Elvis Presley fan convention, but greed and dissention among them ultimately lead to betrayal and chaos.
